title: Medical Laboratory Scientist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is a behavioral based interview questions following the STAR based approach. The interview process is a behavioral based interview questions following the STAR based approach. The interview process is a behavioral based interview questions following the STAR based approach.
Interview Questions: The interview process is a behavioral based interview questions following the STAR based approach.

title: Lab Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: They didn’t show up my first interview and at my second they told me the hours I applied for were not available. They asked vague situation questions that didn’t have anything to do with the actual job.

title: Home Health RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center (Council Bluffs, IA) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: First placed an application then I received a Phone call interview then in person interview. Interview consists of two managers at the s 84th location office. Overall not too terrible
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you went outside your standard area of practice to work with another department?

title: Systems Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center (New York, NY) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Multiple staff interview process,provided list of questions and round robin asking questions including managers. Very friendly group and didn't feel hurried in responding. Final selection process took a few weeks to finalize.
Interview Questions: an accomplishment you are most proud of.

title: Patient Accounts Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center (Omaha, NE) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: I had to come in for an interview, do a phone interview, and pass a drug AND NICOTINE screening. Yes, if you have nicotine in your system you won't be hired at CHMC. It would be one thing being a smoke-free environment and not allowing employees to smoke while they're at work, but what they're doing on their own time is their time, and I believe completely wrong to discriminate against someone because they smoke cigarettes.
Interview Questions: What made you apply at Children's?

title: Medical Record Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center (Omaha, NE) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: Easy, one interview and one phone call and I was hired.I was referred by a friend and applied online, had a phone call within 3 days! Got an offer within 2 weeks.
Interview Questions: How do you deal with different personalities?

title: Magnet Pogram Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center (Omaha, NE) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: The process was timely and managed well. HR met with me first, and ensured I had all I needed for the interviews. I had 5 total interviews, and they all ran on time and smoothly.
Interview Questions: Tell us a time you needed to convince senior leadership to see a need differently in order to move it forward

title: Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Children's Hospital & Medical Center (Omaha, NE) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Very informal and somewhat not professional. The process is lengthy and their 5 I questions are a bit ridiculous especially if you are not an employee there yet and know what they stand for. The manager spoke a lot about a personal life and to me that is nothing that should be brought up during the interviewing process.
